property.caption: Container Element
property.description: The CSS selector used by jQuery for finding the slider container.

property.caption: Namespace
property.description: Prefix string attached to the class of every element generated by the plugin.

property.caption: Selector
property.description: Must match a simple pattern. '{container} > {slide}' -- Ignore pattern at your own peril.

property.caption: Animation
property.description: Select your animation type, "fade" or "slide".

property.caption: Easing
property.description: Determines the easing method used in jQuery transitions.

property.caption: Direction
property.description: Select the sliding direction, "horizontal" or "vertical".

property.caption: Reverse
property.description: Reverse the animation direction.

property.caption: Animation Loop
property.description: Should the animation loop? If false, directionNav will received "disable" classes at either end.

property.caption: Smooth Height
property.description: Allow height of the slider to animate smoothly in horizontal mode.

property.caption: Start At
property.description: The slide that the slider should start on. Array notation (0 = first slide).

property.caption: Slideshow
property.description: Animate slider automatically.

property.caption: Slideshow Speed
property.description: Set the speed of the slideshow cycling, in milliseconds.

property.caption: Animation Speed
property.description: Set the speed of animations, in milliseconds.

property.caption: Initial Delay
property.description: Set an initialization delay, in milliseconds.

property.caption: Randomize
property.description: Randomize slide order.

property.caption: Pause On Action
property.description: Pause the slideshow when interacting with control elements, highly recommended.

property.caption: Pause On Hover
property.description: Pause the slideshow when hovering over slider, then resume when no longer hovering.

property.caption: Use CSS
property.description: Slider will use CSS3 transitions if available.

property.caption: Touch
property.description: Allow touch swipe navigation of the slider on touch-enabled devices.

property.caption: Video
property.description: If using video in the slider, will prevent CSS3 3D Transforms to avoid graphical glitches.

property.caption: Control Navigation
property.description: Create navigation for paging control of each slide?

property.caption: Direction Navigation
property.description: Create navigation for previous/next navigation?

property.caption: Previous Text
property.description: Set the text for the "previous" directionNav item.

property.caption: Next Text
property.description: Set the text for the "next" directionNav item.
